content:
Hi, I’m Yan Pitangui, a software developer based in Brazil. I started as a fullstack developer but over time I’ve become focused on backend and Azure. I really like working with C#/.NET and I’ve also began learning Rust. Lately, I’ve been studying cloud native computing (with Orleans) and Observability (with OpenTelemetry). Here you will find stuff that I share in hope that it becomes useful for someone.
My certifications:
